channel.title: Experience on Shubham Omprakash Patil
channel.description: Recent content in Experience on Shubham Omprakash Patil

item.title: Consultant at the Emerging Technologies Group
item.description: Assisting course instructors during the course (and lab work) in Virtual Reality. Developing 3D model (point cloud and mesh) using the Photogrammetry room at UofM. Consulting students in technical difficulties from softwares like Rhino, Metashape Agisoft, Unity and Oculus.

item.title: TechLab M City: Point One Navigation and Deepen Ai
item.description: Point One Navigation: Research work in analyzing different methodologies for the conversion of Tensorflow model to TensorRT for the CULane dataset. Implementing texture mapping in improving lane detection accuracy.
